Protocols/YNDropDownDelegate.html#/s:FP1.name: changeMenu(title:at:)
Protocols/YNDropDownDelegate.html#/s:FP1.abstract: Change menu title you called. you can call it in YNDropDownMenu or YNDropDownView

Protocols/YNDropDownDelegate.html#/s:FP1.name: changeMenu(title:status:at:)
Protocols/YNDropDownDelegate.html#/s:FP1.abstract: Change view you called. you can call it in YNDropDownMenu or YNDropDownView

Protocols/YNDropDownDelegate.html#/s:FP1.name: changeView(view:at:)
Protocols/YNDropDownDelegate.html#/s:FP1.abstract: Change view you called. you can call it in YNDropDownMenu or YNDropDownView

Protocols/YNDropDownDelegate.html#/s:FP1.name: alwaysSelected(at:)
Protocols/YNDropDownDelegate.html#/s:FP1.abstract: Make button label always selected. (not button image)

Protocols/YNDropDownDelegate.html#/s:FP1.name: normalSelected(at:)
Protocols/YNDropDownDelegate.html#/s:FP1.abstract: Make button label normal that selected before. (not button image)

Classes/YNDropDownMenu.html#/s:vC14YNDro.name: blurEffectView
Classes/YNDropDownMenu.html#/s:vC14YNDro.abstract: Blur effect view will changed if you change this popperty. Backgorund view don’t have to be blur view (e.g. UIColor.black)

Classes/YNDropDownMenu.html#/s:vC14YNDro.name: blurEffectViewAlpha
Classes/YNDropDownMenu.html#/s:vC14YNDro.abstract: Alpha Value if animation ended in hideMenu() function

Classes/YNDropDownMenu.html#/s:FC14YNDro.name: init(frame:dropDownViews:dropDownViewTitles:)
Classes/YNDropDownMenu.html#/s:FC14YNDro.abstract: Init YNDropDownMenu with frame, views, strings. Views count and titles count should be same

Classes/YNDropDownMenu.html#/s:FC14YNDro.name: init(frame:YNDropDownViews:dropDownViewTitles:)
Classes/YNDropDownMenu.html#/s:FC14YNDro.abstract: deprecated use init(frame: CGRect, dropDownViews: [UIView], dropDownViewTitles: [String]) instead

Classes/YNDropDownMenu.html#/s:FC14YNDro.name: init(coder:)
Classes/YNDropDownMenu.html#/s:FC14YNDro.abstract: Init coder

Classes/YNDropDownMenu.html#/s:FC14YNDro.name: setImageWhen(normal:selected:disabled:)
Classes/YNDropDownMenu.html#/s:FC14YNDro.abstract: Set arrow image or other images. Same image size is the best

Classes/YNDropDownMenu.html#/s:FC14YNDro.name: setImageWhen(normal:selectedTintColor:disabledTintColor:)
Classes/YNDropDownMenu.html#/s:FC14YNDro.abstract: Set an image for a drop-down button with various colors.

Classes/YNDropDownMenu.html#/s:FC14YNDro.name: setImageWhen(normal:selectedTintColorRGB:disabledTintColorRGB:)
Classes/YNDropDownMenu.html#/s:FC14YNDro.abstract: Set an image for a drop-down button with various colors.

Classes/YNDropDownMenu.html#/s:FC14YNDro.name: setBackgroundColor(color:)
Classes/YNDropDownMenu.html#/s:FC14YNDro.abstract: Set backgroung color.

Classes/YNDropDownMenu.html#/s:FC14YNDro.name: setLabelColorWhen(normal:selected:disabled:)
Classes/YNDropDownMenu.html#/s:FC14YNDro.abstract: Set label color.

Classes/YNDropDownMenu.html#/s:FC14YNDro.name: setLabelColorWhen(normalRGB:selectedRGB:disabledRGB:)
Classes/YNDropDownMenu.html#/s:FC14YNDro.abstract: Set label color with hex color codes

Classes/YNDropDownMenu.html#/s:FC14YNDro.name: setLabel(font:)
Classes/YNDropDownMenu.html#/s:FC14YNDro.abstract: Set the same label font for every status.

Classes/YNDropDownMenu.html#/s:FC14YNDro.name: setLabelFontWhen(normal:selected:disabled:)
Classes/YNDropDownMenu.html#/s:FC14YNDro.abstract: Set label font.

Classes/YNDropDownMenu.html#/s:FC14YNDro.name: alwaysSelected(at:)
Classes/YNDropDownMenu.html#/s:FC14YNDro.abstract: Make button label always selected. (not button image)

Classes/YNDropDownMenu.html#/s:FC14YNDro.name: normalSelected(at:)
Classes/YNDropDownMenu.html#/s:FC14YNDro.abstract: Make button label normal that selected before. (not button image)

Classes/YNDropDownMenu.html#/s:FC14YNDro.name: disabledMenu(at:)
Classes/YNDropDownMenu.html#/s:FC14YNDro.abstract: Make button disabled (title and image you set)

Classes/YNDropDownMenu.html#/s:FC14YNDro.name: enabledMenu(at:)
Classes/YNDropDownMenu.html#/s:FC14YNDro.abstract: Makes button enabled (title and image you set)

Classes/YNDropDownMenu.html#/s:FC14YNDro.name: hideMenu()
Classes/YNDropDownMenu.html#/s:FC14YNDro.abstract: Hide menu will be called when view is opened already.

Classes/YNDropDownMenu.html#/s:FC14YNDro.name: changeMenu(title:at:)
Classes/YNDropDownMenu.html#/s:FC14YNDro.abstract: Change menu title you called. you can call it in YNDropDownMenu or YNDropDownView

Classes/YNDropDownMenu.html#/s:FC14YNDro.name: changeMenu(title:status:at:)
Classes/YNDropDownMenu.html#/s:FC14YNDro.abstract: Change menu title you called. you can call it in YNDropDownMenu or YNDropDownView

Classes/YNDropDownMenu.html#/s:FC14YNDro.name: changeView(view:at:)
Classes/YNDropDownMenu.html#/s:FC14YNDro.abstract: Change view you called. you can call it in YNDropDownMenu or YNDropDownView

Classes/YNDropDownMenu.html#/s:FC14YNDro.name: showAndHideMenu(at:)
Classes/YNDropDownMenu.html#/s:FC14YNDro.abstract: View will be closed and open when already opened. If not, just open drop down view

Classes/YNDropDownMenu.html#/s:FC14YNDro.name: alwaysSelectedAt(index:)
Classes/YNDropDownMenu.html#/s:FC14YNDro.abstract: Deprecated use alwaysSelected(at index: Int) instead

Classes/YNDropDownMenu.html#/s:FC14YNDro.name: disabledMenuAt(index:)
Classes/YNDropDownMenu.html#/s:FC14YNDro.abstract: Deprecated use disabledMenu(at index: Int) instead

Classes/YNDropDownMenu.html#/s:FC14YNDro.name: enabledMenuAt(index:)
Classes/YNDropDownMenu.html#/s:FC14YNDro.abstract: Deprecated use enabledMenu(at index: Int) instead

Classes/YNDropDownMenu.html#/s:FC14YNDro.name: showAndHideMenuAt(index:)
Classes/YNDropDownMenu.html#/s:FC14YNDro.abstract: Deprecated use showAndHideMenu(at index: Int) instead

Classes/YNDropDownView.html#/s:FC14YNDro.name: dropDownViewOpened()
Classes/YNDropDownView.html#/s:FC14YNDro.abstract: Override this method if you want to get call back opened

Classes/YNDropDownView.html#/s:FC14YNDro.name: dropDownViewClosed()
Classes/YNDropDownView.html#/s:FC14YNDro.abstract: Override this method if you want to get call back closed

Classes/YNDropDownView.html#/s:FC14YNDro.name: changeMenu(title:at:)
Classes/YNDropDownView.html#/s:FC14YNDro.abstract: Change menu title you called. you can call it in YNDropDownMenu or YNDropDownView

Classes/YNDropDownView.html#/s:FC14YNDro.abstract: Change menu title you called. you can call it in YNDropDownMenu or YNDropDownView

Classes/YNDropDownView.html#/s:FC14YNDro.name: changeView(view:at:)
Classes/YNDropDownView.html#/s:FC14YNDro.abstract: Change view you called. you can call it in YNDropDownMenu or YNDropDownView

Classes/YNDropDownView.html#/s:FC14YNDro.abstract: Make button label always selected. (not button image)

Classes/YNDropDownView.html#/s:FC14YNDro.name: normalSelected(at:)
Classes/YNDropDownView.html#/s:FC14YNDro.abstract: Make button label normal that selected before. (not button image)
